hyperEntityToCell

public abstract org.hypertable.thriftgen.Cell hyperEntityToCell(T hyperEntity)
                                                         throws HyperMappingException
Suitable for single cell HyperEntity types only, the method returns null for multiple cell HyperEntity types. Converts the HyperEntity passed as parameter to a Hypertable cell.

Parameters:

Returns:
The Hypertable cell

cellToHyperEntity

public abstract T cellToHyperEntity(org.hypertable.thriftgen.Cell cell)
                             throws HyperMappingException
Suitable for single cell HyperEntity types only, the method returns null for multiple cell HyperEntity types. Converts the Hypertable cell passed as parameter to a HyperEntity.

The HyperEntity

getIsSingleCell

public abstract boolean getIsSingleCell()
Tells if the mapper's HyperEntity type is single cell or not.

Returns:

hyperEntityListToCellList

public java.util.List<org.hypertable.thriftgen.Cell> hyperEntityListToCellList(java.util.List<T> hyperEntityList)
Returns a Hypertable cell list constructed from the HyperEntity list passed as parameter. HyperEntity instances for which the cell list transformation fails will be skipped.

Parameters:
hyperEntityList - The HyperEntity list.
Returns:
The Hypertable cell list constructed from the HyperEntity list.

cellListToHyperEntityList

public java.util.List<T> cellListToHyperEntityList(java.util.List<org.hypertable.thriftgen.Cell> cells)
Returns a HyperEntity list constructed from the Hypertable cells passed as parameter. Assumes that the cell list is ordered such that cells with the same row key follow each other. Invalid cells will be skipped.

Parameters:
cells - The Hypertable cell list.
Returns:
The HyperEntity list constructed from the Hypertable cells.
